name: Stressful Pong
description:
One of several projects built in Intro to Video Game Programming Spring 2021.

CONTROLS

  • Player 1: W = Up. S = Down
  • Player 2: Up arrow = Up. Down Arrow = Down

MODIFIERS

  • Ball gets faster every hit
  • Scoring shrinks previous winner's paddle
  • Scoring grows previous loser's paddle
  • Powerup - Ball goes faster
  • Powerup - Ball gets bigger
  • Powerup - Blinds both opponents
